skills.name: Mana Break
skills.description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack. Mana Break deals 60% of the mana burned as damage to the target.

skills.name: Blink
skills.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

skills.name: Spell Shield
skills.description: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.

skills.name: Mana Void
skills.description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.

skills.name: Berserker's Call
skills.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

skills.name: Battle Hunger
skills.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.

skills.name: Counter Helix
skills.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.

skills.name: Culling Blade
skills.description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

skills.name: Enfeeble
skills.description: Weakens an enemy unit, reducing its physical damage. Lasts 20 seconds.

skills.name: Brain Sap
skills.description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.

skills.name: Nightmare
skills.description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep and deals damage per second.  Sleeping units are awakened when attacked, but the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit.  The nightmared unit instantly wakes up if it takes damage.

skills.name: Fiend's Grip
skills.description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.

skills.name: Bloodrage
skills.description: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage during which a unit deals, and takes, increased damage. Units affected by Bloodrage will be healed for a percentage of the max health of any units they kill. Units affected by Bloodrage when killed will heal a percentage of their max health to their killer.

skills.name: Blood Rite
skills.description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 3.0 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.

skills.name: Thirst
skills.description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed and attack damage whenever an enemy hero's health falls below 75%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero.

skills.name: Rupture
skills.description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture. If the unit moves, it takes a percentage of the distance traveled as damage.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.

skills.name: Crystal Nova
skills.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.

skills.name: Frostbite
skills.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing 50 damage every half-second. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.

skills.name: Arcane Aura
skills.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden.

skills.name: Freezing Field
skills.description: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Lasts 10 seconds.

skills.name: Frost Arrows
skills.description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement. Lasts 1.5 seconds on Heroes, and 7.0 seconds on creeps.

skills.name: Gust
skills.description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.

skills.name: Precision Aura
skills.description: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility. Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.

skills.name: Marksmanship
skills.description: Drow's experiences in battle improve her accuracy and effectiveness in combat, providing a passive bonus to Agility. Grants no bonus if there are enemy heroes within 400 range.

skills.name: Fissure
skills.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.

skills.name: Enchant Totem
skills.description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.

skills.name: Aftershock
skills.description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

skills.name: Echo Slam
skills.description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.

skills.name: Blade Fury
skills.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Lasts 5 seconds.

skills.name: Healing Ward
skills.description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health. The Healing Ward moves at 420 movement speed after being summoned. Lasts 25 seconds.

skills.name: Blade Dance
skills.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.

skills.name: Omnislash
skills.description: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 200-225 damage per slash. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

skills.name: Starstorm
skills.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 425 radius will be struck a second time for 75% of the damage.

skills.name: Sacred Arrow
skills.description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 5.0 seconds, with bonus damage up to 140 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.

skills.name: Leap
skills.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 5 seconds.

skills.name: Moonlight Shadow
skills.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.

skills.name: Waveform
skills.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.

skills.name: Adaptive Strike
skills.description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning the target while dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier. If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum damage and the minimum stun is dealt. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun and minimum damage are dealt.

skills.name: Morph (Agility Gain)
skills.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.

skills.name: Replicate
skills.description: Morphling replicates any hero, friend or foe, dealing 80.0% of the original Hero's outgoing damage while taking 100% of any incoming damage. At any time, Morphling can instantly take the position of the Replicate for 150 mana. If Morphling dies, the Replicate will expire.

skills.name: Shadowraze
skills.description: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

skills.name: Necromastery
skills.description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. If the killed unit is a hero, he gains 12 souls. On death, he releases half of them from bondage.

skills.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
skills.description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.

skills.name: Requiem of Souls
skills.description: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will have its movement speed and attack damage reduced. Lines of energy are created for every 2 souls captured through Necromastery. Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.

skills.name: Spirit Lance
skills.description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.

skills.name: Doppelganger
skills.description: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1.0 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 600% damage and deals 20% damage.

skills.name: Phantom Rush
skills.description: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost upon reaching the target. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.

skills.name: Juxtapose
skills.description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.

skills.name: Illusory Orb
skills.description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.

skills.name: Waning Rift
skills.description: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

skills.name: Phase Shift
skills.description: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.

skills.name: Dream Coil
skills.description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for 0.5 seconds and damaging them. If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.

skills.name: Meat Hook
skills.description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.

skills.name: Rot
skills.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

skills.name: Flesh Heap
skills.description: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.

skills.name: Dismember
skills.description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.

skills.name: Plasma Field
skills.description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage increases with distance from Razor.

skills.name: Static Link
skills.description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor.

skills.name: Unstable Current
skills.description: Razor moves with increased speed, and any abilities targeted at him are instantly countered with a jolt of electricity which damages, slows, and purges buffs from enemies.

skills.name: Eye of the Storm
skills.description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.

skills.name: Burrowstrike
skills.description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.

skills.name: Sand Storm
skills.description: CHANNELED - Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.

skills.name: Caustic Finale
skills.description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when its timer expires, or when the unit dies, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Deals less damage if its timer expires.

skills.name: Epicenter
skills.description: CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

skills.name: Static Remnant
skills.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.

skills.name: Electric Vortex
skills.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Overload
skills.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

skills.name: Ball Lightning
skills.description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 30+8% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 12+0.7% of his total mana pool. Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

skills.name: Storm Hammer
skills.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.

skills.name: Great Cleave
skills.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.

skills.name: Warcry
skills.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor. Lasts 8 seconds.

skills.name: God's Strength
skills.description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.

skills.name: Avalanche
skills.description: Bombards an area with rocks, stunning and damaging enemy land units.

skills.name: Toss
skills.description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 275 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land. If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra 20% damage. Toss does more damage with each level in Grow.

skills.name: Craggy Exterior
skills.description: Causes damage to bounce back on Tiny's attackers. Melee enemies that attack Tiny have a chance of being stunned. The proc chance improves with each level in Grow.

skills.name: Grow
skills.description: Tiny gains craggy mass that increases his power at the cost of his attack speed. Increases Tossed unit damage and improves movement speed, and improves Craggy Exterior proc chance.

skills.name: Magic Missile
skills.description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

skills.name: Wave of Terror
skills.description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.

skills.name: Vengeance Aura
skills.description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the physical damage of nearby friendly units. If Vengeful Spirit is slain, her killer will be possessed with a negative Vengeance Aura, reducing the damage of her killer and its nearby allies until Vengeful Spirit revives.

skills.name: Nether Swap
skills.description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy.  Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.

skills.name: Shackleshot
skills.description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it. If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75.

skills.name: Powershot
skills.description: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies and destroys trees along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 20%.

skills.name: Windrun
skills.description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.

skills.name: Focus Fire
skills.description: Windranger channels the wind to gain 500 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage. Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced. Lasts 20 seconds.

skills.name: Arc Lightning
skills.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.

skills.name: Static Field
skills.description: Zeus shocks all nearby enemy units whenever he casts a spell, causing damage proportional to their current health.

skills.name: Thundergod's Wrath
skills.description: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

skills.name: Torrent
skills.description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

skills.name: Tidebringer
skills.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.

skills.name: X Marks the Spot
skills.description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.

skills.name: Ghostship
skills.description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.

skills.name: Dragon Slave
skills.description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.

skills.name: Light Strike Array
skills.description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.

skills.name: Fiery Soul
skills.description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 10 seconds.

skills.name: Laguna Blade
skills.description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

skills.name: Earth Spike
skills.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

skills.name: Hex
skills.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.

skills.name: Mana Drain
skills.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.

skills.name: Finger of Death
skills.description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.

skills.name: Ether Shock
skills.description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.

skills.name: Hex
skills.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

skills.name: Shackles
skills.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.

skills.name: Mass Serpent Ward
skills.description: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic. It takes two hits to destroy a single Ward.

skills.name: Guardian Sprint
skills.description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units, though becoming more vulnerable to damage.

skills.name: Slithereen Crush
skills.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

skills.name: Bash of the Deep
skills.description: Grants a chance that an attack will do bonus damage and stun an enemy.  The duration is doubled against creeps.

skills.name: Corrosive Haze
skills.description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.

skills.name: Gush
skills.description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor. Lasts 4 seconds.

skills.name: Kraken Shell
skills.description: Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

skills.name: Anchor Smash
skills.description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

skills.name: Ravage
skills.description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

skills.name: Paralyzing Cask
skills.description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.

skills.name: Voodoo Restoration
skills.description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units.

skills.name: Maledict
skills.description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.

skills.name: Death Ward
skills.description: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward with true strike to attack enemy heroes within 700 range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds.

skills.name: Frost Blast
skills.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds. The primary target takes the most damage.

skills.name: Ice Armor
skills.description: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts 40 seconds.

skills.name: Sacrifice
skills.description: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich.

skills.name: Chain Frost
skills.description: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to [10, 10, 10] times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. The first target is mini-stunned.

options: Attacks Apply 30% MS and AS Slow

skills.name: Smoke Screen
skills.description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss most attacks, as well as slowing movement.

skills.name: Blink Strike
skills.description: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

skills.name: Cloak and Dagger
skills.description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

skills.name: Tricks of the Trade
skills.description: CHANNELED - Phases out of the world while striking every enemy from behind in a 500 AoE once per second.

skills.name: Malefice
skills.description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances. An instance strikes every 2 seconds.

skills.name: Demonic Conversion
skills.description: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.

skills.name: Midnight Pulse
skills.description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.

skills.name: Black Hole
skills.description: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.

skills.name: Laser
skills.description: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks.

skills.name: Heat-Seeking Missile
skills.description: Launches a pair of rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range.

skills.name: March of the Machines
skills.description: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.

skills.name: Rearm
skills.description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.

skills.name: Shrapnel
skills.description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 55 seconds.

skills.name: Headshot
skills.description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly stop the movements of his enemies.

skills.name: Take Aim
skills.description: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.

skills.name: Assassinate
skills.description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after 2 seconds, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range, and mini-stuns the target.

skills.name: Death Pulse
skills.description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units. Passively provides regen for 7.0 seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.

skills.name: Ghost Shroud
skills.description: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.

skills.name: Heartstopper Aura
skills.description: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.

skills.name: Reaper's Scythe
skills.description: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. Heroes killed by Reaper's Scythe will have [10, 20, 30] seconds added to their respawn timer. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.

skills.name: Fatal Bonds
skills.description: Binds several enemy units together, causing 25% of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.

skills.name: Shadow Word
skills.description: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.

skills.name: Upheaval
skills.description: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to 16 seconds. Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.

skills.name: Chaotic Offering
skills.description: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.

options: Magic Immunity for Chaotic Offering Golems

skills.name: Wild Axes
skills.description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once.

skills.name: Call of the Wild: Hawk
skills.description: Beastmaster calls forth a watchful Hawk to scout the battlefield. At level 3 and beyond, the hawk can become invisible after being still for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Call of the Wild: Boar
skills.description: Beastmaster calls a powerful Boar to stalk the battlefield, capable of spitting poison at enemies to slow their movement and attack speed.

skills.name: Inner Beast
skills.description: Untaps the inner fury of allies, passively increasing their attack speed.

skills.name: Primal Roar
skills.description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open, a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed.

skills.name: Shadow Strike
skills.description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds. An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.

skills.name: Blink
skills.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.

skills.name: Scream Of Pain
skills.description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.

skills.name: Sonic Wave
skills.description: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake.

skills.name: Venomous Gale
skills.description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement. Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

skills.name: Poison Sting
skills.description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.

skills.name: Plague Ward
skills.description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.

skills.name: Poison Nova
skills.description: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer. Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.

skills.name: Time Walk
skills.description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2.0 seconds.

skills.name: Time Dilation
skills.description: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for [6.0, 8.0, 10.0, 12.0] seconds, freezing their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 14% for each cooldown frozen.

skills.name: Time Lock
skills.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.

skills.name: Chronosphere
skills.description: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.

skills.name: Wraithfire Blast
skills.description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.

skills.name: Vampiric Aura
skills.description: Nearby friendly units restore health based on the damage they deal when attacking enemy units.

skills.name: Mortal Strike
skills.description: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack.

skills.name: Reincarnation
skills.description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle. Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.

skills.name: Crypt Swarm
skills.description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.

skills.name: Silence
skills.description: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.

skills.name: Spirit Siphon
skills.description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining 14.0 + [1.0, 2.5, 4.0, 5.5]% Max HP per second and slowing the enemy's movement speed by [5, 10, 15, 20]%.

skills.name: Exorcism
skills.description: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Lasts 35 seconds.

skills.name: Stifling Dagger
skills.description: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing 65+[25, 40, 55, 70]% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.

skills.name: Phantom Strike
skills.description: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.

skills.name: Blur
skills.description: Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks, and allowing her to blur her body to disappear from the enemy team's minimap when far from enemy heroes.

skills.name: Coup de Grace
skills.description: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.

skills.name: Nether Blast
skills.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.

skills.name: Decrepify
skills.description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.

skills.name: Nether Ward
skills.description: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward reduces the mana regeneration of nearby enemy heroes, and will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell. Nether Ward deals damage equal to the damage multiplier times the mana spent by the enemy hero.

skills.name: Life Drain
skills.description: CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

skills.name: Refraction
skills.description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.

skills.name: Meld
skills.description: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still. If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Psi Blades
skills.description: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range.

skills.name: Psionic Trap
skills.description: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30% in the area. Traps charge up to slow an additional 5% every second, up to 50%.

skills.name: Poison Attack
skills.description: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that slows attack and movement speed while dealing damage over time.

skills.name: Nethertoxin
skills.description: Nethertoxin causes Viper's normal attack to deal bonus damage to units based on how much health they are missing. The bonus damage doubles for each 20% of health missing from the target. Nethertoxin deals half damage to creeps and buildings.

skills.name: Corrosive Skin
skills.description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows any enemy that damages it in a 1400 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.

skills.name: Viper Strike
skills.description: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

skills.name: Lucent Beam
skills.description: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.

skills.name: Moon Glaive
skills.description: Empowers Luna's glaive, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.

skills.name: Lunar Blessing
skills.description: Increases the damage dealt by attacks from Luna and nearby allied heroes. Luna is also blessed with increased vision range at night.

skills.name: Eclipse
skills.description: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Breathe Fire
skills.description: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.

skills.name: Dragon Tail
skills.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage. When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.

skills.name: Dragon Blood
skills.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

skills.name: Elder Dragon Form
skills.description: Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.

skills.name: Poison Touch
skills.description: Casts a poisonous spell on an enemy unit, gradually slowing movement, and causing damage over time.

skills.name: Shallow Grave
skills.description: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.

skills.name: Shadow Wave
skills.description: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.

skills.name: Weave
skills.description: Applies a buff that increases the armor of allied heroes while decreasing the armor of enemy heroes in the target area over time.

skills.name: Battery Assault
skills.description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.

skills.name: Power Cogs
skills.description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.

skills.name: Rocket Flare
skills.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Hookshot
skills.description: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.

skills.name: Split Earth
skills.description: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.

skills.name: Diabolic Edict
skills.description: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal physical damage to enemy units and structures. The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take. Deals 40% more damage to towers. Lasts 10 seconds.

skills.name: Lightning Storm
skills.description: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.

skills.name: Pulse Nova
skills.description: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.

skills.name: Rage
skills.description: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, 100% resistant to magic damage, and gaining increased attack speed.

skills.name: Feast
skills.description: Lifestealer's attacks damage enemies and heal himself for a percentage of his target's current health.

skills.name: Open Wounds
skills.description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.

skills.name: Infest
skills.description: Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack, and when consumed the creep will heal Lifestealer's health equal to the creep's current health.  Does not work on enemy heroes.

skills.name: Vacuum
skills.description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.

skills.name: Ion Shell
skills.description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.

skills.name: Surge
skills.description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of maximum movement speed.

skills.name: Wall of Replica
skills.description: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.

skills.name: Strafe
skills.description: Clinkz attacks with a barrage of arrows.  Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time.

skills.name: Searing Arrows
skills.description: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.

skills.name: Skeleton Walk
skills.description: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses an ability.

skills.name: Death Pact
skills.description: Clinkz consumes the target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percent of its hitpoints as max health and damage.

skills.name: Purification
skills.description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

skills.name: Repel
skills.description: Creates a divine barrier around an ally which grants them Spell Immunity and 100% resistance to Magic Damage.

skills.name: Degen Aura
skills.description: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.

skills.name: Guardian Angel
skills.description: Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage.

skills.name: Untouchable
skills.description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.

skills.name: Enchant
skills.description: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control. If cast on a creep already under her control, she refreshes its enchant duration.

skills.name: Nature's Attendants
skills.description: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts 11 seconds.

skills.name: Impetus
skills.description: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.

skills.name: Inner Vitality
skills.description: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 35%, it will heal faster. Lasts 16 seconds.

skills.name: Burning Spear
skills.description: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack. Multiple attacks will stack additional damage. Each attack drains some of Huskar's health. Lasts 8 seconds.

skills.name: Berserker's Blood
skills.description: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic damage resistance based on missing health.

skills.name: Life Break
skills.description: Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them.  While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune.

skills.name: Void
skills.description: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage.  Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities. The slowing effect lasts longer at night.

skills.name: Crippling Fear
skills.description: Night Stalker horrifies the target enemy Hero, causing it to miss attacks and become silenced.  The effect lasts longer at night.

skills.name: Hunter in the Night
skills.description: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness. Can be activated during night to grant Night Stalker flying movement for 2.0 seconds.

skills.name: Darkness
skills.description: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. While Darkness is in effect, enemy heroes, units, wards and buildings have their vision range reduced to 675.

skills.name: Spawn Spiderlings
skills.description: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

skills.name: Spin Web
skills.description: Spins a large web that renders Broodmother invisible, grants a passive movement speed increase, gives free movement, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity. Spin Web charges restore every 40.0 seconds. If damage is taken, free movement is disabled and the movement speed increase is halved for 6.0 seconds. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.

skills.name: Incapacitating Bite
skills.description: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.

skills.name: Insatiable Hunger
skills.description: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.

skills.name: Shuriken Toss
skills.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target. The shuriken will bounce between any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.

skills.name: Jinada
skills.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.

skills.name: Shadow Walk
skills.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.

skills.name: Track
skills.description: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Allies near the hunted are granted bonus movement speed. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold.

skills.name: The Swarm
skills.description: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.

skills.name: Shukuchi
skills.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.

skills.name: Geminate Attack
skills.description: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.

skills.name: Time Lapse
skills.description: Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

skills.name: Dual Breath
skills.description: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.

skills.name: Ice Path
skills.description: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.

skills.name: Liquid Fire
skills.description: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.

skills.name: Macropyre
skills.description: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.

skills.name: Sticky Napalm
skills.description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area. Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks. The extra damage is halved against creeps.

skills.name: Flamebreak
skills.description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.

skills.name: Firefly
skills.description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. While flying, Batrider gains unobstructed movement and vision.

skills.name: Flaming Lasso
skills.description: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.

skills.name: Penitence
skills.description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.

skills.name: Test of Faith
skills.description: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.

skills.name: Holy Persuasion
skills.description: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum.

skills.name: Hand of God
skills.description: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.

skills.name: Spectral Dagger
skills.description: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.

skills.name: Desolate
skills.description: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy who is alone.

skills.name: Dispersion
skills.description: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

skills.name: Haunt
skills.description: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero after a short delay. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.

skills.name: Cold Feet
skills.description: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point. If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.

skills.name: Ice Vortex
skills.description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range. Lasts 16 seconds.

skills.name: Chilling Touch
skills.description: A frigid gust enchants allied heroes, granting them bonus magical damage for a given number of physical attacks, while slowing their attack speed slightly. Ancient Apparition always receives the buff. Lasts 30 seconds.

skills.name: Ice Blast
skills.description: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.

skills.name: Devour
skills.description: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed.

skills.name: Scorched Earth
skills.description: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies and heal Doom, while also granting him increased movement speed.

skills.name: Infernal Blade
skills.description: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.6 seconds and applies a 4.0 second burn that deals [25, 30, 35, 40] + [1.25, 2.5, 3.75, 5.0]% of the target's Max HP as damage per second.

skills.name: Doom
skills.description: Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.

skills.name: Earthshock
skills.description: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Overpower
skills.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.

skills.name: Fury Swipes
skills.description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage. If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

skills.name: Enrage
skills.description: Ursa goes into a frenzy, multiplying his Fury Swipes damage and causing him to take 80% less damage. Removes any existing debuffs.

skills.name: Charge of Darkness
skills.description: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.

skills.name: Empowering Haste
skills.description: Causes Spirit Breaker to gain power with higher movement speed. His presence increases the movement speed of nearby allied units. Can be cast to improve the movement speed bonus for 6 seconds, however afterward the passive bonus will be halved while the ability is on cooldown.

skills.name: Greater Bash
skills.description: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack, as well as gaining bonus movement speed after a bash occurs. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.

skills.name: Nether Strike
skills.description: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage.

skills.name: Rocket Barrage
skills.description: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter. Lasts 3 seconds.

skills.name: Homing Missile
skills.description: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target.  Homing Missile deals greater damage the further it has traveled.  Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.

skills.name: Flak Cannon
skills.description: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks. Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike. Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.

skills.name: Call Down
skills.description: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area. Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow for 2 seconds; the second dealing minor damage and major slow for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Acid Spray
skills.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

skills.name: Unstable Concoction
skills.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.

skills.name: Greevil's Greed
skills.description: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next 30 seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield 2.5 times their normal gold.

skills.name: Chemical Rage
skills.description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.

skills.name: Quas
skills.description: Allows manipulation of ice elements. Each <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> instance provides increased health regeneration.

skills.name: Wex
skills.description: Allows manipulation of storm elements. Each <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.

skills.name: Exort
skills.description: Allows manipulation of fire elements. Each <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> instance provides increased attack damage.

skills.name: Invoke
skills.description: Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use.  Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

skills.name: Arcane Curse
skills.description: Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage and slowing their movement speed. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased.

skills.name: Glaives of Wisdom
skills.description: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence.

skills.name: Last Word
skills.description: Enchants a target, causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires.

skills.name: Global Silence
skills.description: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

skills.name: Arcane Orb
skills.description: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Devourer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool. Steals [1, 2, 3, 4] intelligence for 80.0 seconds per hit when attacking an enemy hero. Arcane Orb also does bonus damage to summoned units and illusions.

skills.name: Astral Imprisonment
skills.description: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals [100, 175, 250, 325] damage to enemies in a 400 radius around the target.

skills.name: Essence Aura
skills.description: Whenever nearby allied Heroes or Outworld Devourer itself casts a spell, it gains a chance to restore a percentage of its mana pool.  Outworld Devourer also passively gains a bonus to its base mana pool.  Several skills with no cooldown and toggled spells cannot trigger Essence Aura.

skills.name: Sanity's Eclipse
skills.description: Unleashes a psychic blast that removes 40% of the mana from affected heroes, while also damaging them based on the difference between the affected hero's Intelligence and Outworld Devourer's. If an enemy hero has the same or higher Intelligence than Outworld Devourer, Sanity's Eclipse will not cause damage. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment.

skills.name: Summon Wolves
skills.description: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan. Level 3-4 wolves have Cripple, and level 4 wolves have permanent invisibility.

skills.name: Howl
skills.description: Grants bonus damage and bonus health to Lycan, all allied heroes and all units under their control. Howl has double effect during night.

skills.name: Feral Impulse
skills.description: Increases the HP regeneration and damage of Lycan and all units under his control.

skills.name: Shapeshift
skills.description: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a 40% chance to deal a critical strike doing [160, 180, 200]% damage.

skills.name: Thunder Clap
skills.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.

skills.name: Drunken Haze
skills.description: Drenches a target in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.

skills.name: Drunken Brawler
skills.description: Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage. Drunken Brawler will always trigger if you have not attacked, or have not been attacked, in the last several seconds.

skills.name: Primal Split
skills.description: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.

skills.name: Disruption
skills.description: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.

skills.name: Soul Catcher
skills.description: Applies damage amplification on enemies in an area. The amplification is evenly spread among all enemies in the area. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Soul Catcher.

skills.name: Shadow Poison
skills.description: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each. This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.

skills.name: Demonic Purge
skills.description: Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration.  The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

skills.name: Summon Spirit Bear
skills.description: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items. If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack. Lone Druid suffers 10.0% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies. As the bear increases in levels, it can learn the Return, Entangling Claws, and Demolish abilities. Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.

skills.name: Rabid
skills.description: Increases the attack and movement speed of Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear.

skills.name: Savage Roar
skills.description: Lone Druid roars fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by 20%.

skills.name: True Form
skills.description: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage and some base movement speed, but gaining melee power as well as the Battle Cry ability.  He can morph freely between druid and bear form.

skills.name: Chaos Bolt
skills.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

skills.name: Reality Rift
skills.description: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Reduces the target's armor for 8 seconds.

skills.name: Chaos Strike
skills.description: Each of Chaos Knight's attacks has a chance to deal bonus damage, also causing the critical strike to lifesteal for 75% of the damage .

skills.name: Phantasm
skills.description: Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. There is a 50% chance an extra phantasm will be summoned. The phantasms deal [100, 100, 100]% damage, but take 260% damage.

skills.name: Earthbind
skills.description: Tosses a net at the target point, pinning down all enemy units.  Earthbind prevents invisibility and blink.

skills.name: Poof
skills.description: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, dealing damage in both the departure and arrival locations.

skills.name: Geostrike
skills.description: Meepo enchants his weapon to deal damage per second, as well as slow the movement speed of the attacked unit.  Geostrikes from multiple Meepos stack.

skills.name: Divided We Stand
skills.description: Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience, attributes and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die.

skills.name: Nature's Guise
skills.description: Turns Treant invisible when he is within 265 radius of a tree for [7.0, 6.0, 5.0, 3.0] seconds. Increases movement speed by [10, 18, 26, 34] while invisible, and causes a [0.4, 1.0, 1.6, 2.2] seconds disarming root when attacking out of invisibility.

skills.name: Leech Seed
skills.description: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it. Pulses 6 times.

skills.name: Living Armor
skills.description: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which grants bonus regeneration. Also blocks some damage from all sources. Dispels when a number of damage instances are taken.

skills.name: Overgrowth
skills.description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

skills.name: Fireblast
skills.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

skills.name: Ignite
skills.description: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

skills.name: Bloodlust
skills.description: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Can be cast on towers.

skills.name: Multicast
skills.description: Enables Ogre Magi to cast his spells multiple times with each use, while also granting his spells greater potency:

skills.name: Decay
skills.description: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself.

skills.name: Soul Rip
skills.description: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.

skills.name: Tombstone
skills.description: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.

skills.name: Flesh Golem
skills.description: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem that possesses a Plague Aura. This aura slows all enemy units within 750 range and amplifies the damage they take; the closer to Undying, the more damage and slow. When a plagued unit dies, Undying is healed equal to a percentage of his own maximum health.

skills.name: Telekinesis
skills.description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.

skills.name: Fade Bolt
skills.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage.  Each jump deals less damage.

skills.name: Null Field
skills.description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane protects nearby allies against weaker magics, granting them magic resistance.

skills.name: Spell Steal
skills.description: Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies.

skills.name: Thunder Strike
skills.description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius.  Provides vision of its target.

skills.name: Glimpse
skills.description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago. Instantly kills illusions.

skills.name: Kinetic Field
skills.description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.

skills.name: Static Storm
skills.description: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

skills.name: Impale
skills.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

skills.name: Mana Burn
skills.description: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.

skills.name: Spiked Carapace
skills.description: When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.

skills.name: Vendetta
skills.description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.

skills.name: Mirror Image
skills.description: Creates three images of Naga Siren under her control.

skills.name: Ensnare
skills.description: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.

skills.name: Rip Tide
skills.description: The Naga Siren and her images hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 8 seconds.

skills.name: Song of the Siren
skills.description: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.

skills.name: Illuminate
skills.description: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.

skills.name: Mana Leak
skills.description: Weakens an enemy's magical essence, causing them to lose mana as they move.  If the enemy loses all of its mana, it will be stunned.

skills.name: Chakra Magic
skills.description: Restores mana to the target unit, increases its mana capacity, and reduces the cooldown of the next spell they cast.

skills.name: Spirit Form
skills.description: Ezalor temporarily turns his body luminescent, gaining various abilities.  Illuminate is now channeled by a separate spirit, and gains the Blinding Light and Recall abilities.

skills.name: Tether
skills.description: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, tethered units target gain 1.5x the amount. Any enemy unit that crosses the tether is slowed. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.

skills.name: Spirits
skills.description: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode.  When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.

skills.name: Overcharge
skills.description: Io gains bonus attack speed and damage reduction, at the cost of draining a percentage of its current health and mana per second.  If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.

skills.name: Relocate
skills.description: Teleports Io and any tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires Io and any tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

skills.name: Grave Chill
skills.description: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself.

skills.name: Soul Assumption
skills.description: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than 110 damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.

skills.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
skills.description: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.

skills.name: Summon Familiars
skills.description: Conjures two blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars have high attack power, but each attack drains a charge of damage that recharges slowly over time.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.

skills.name: Dark Pact
skills.description: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself. Slark only takes 50% of the damage.

skills.name: Pounce
skills.description: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.

skills.name: Essence Shift
skills.description: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.

skills.name: Shadow Dance
skills.description: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.

skills.name: Split Shot
skills.description: Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.

skills.name: Mystic Snake
skills.description: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage and stealing mana. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake deals more damage per jump and steals [11, 14, 17, 20]% of the targets' total mana. Deals Pure damage to units petrified by Stone Gaze.

skills.name: Mana Shield
skills.description: Creates a shield that absorbs 60.0% of the incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana.

skills.name: Stone Gaze
skills.description: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed. If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone. Petrified units are stunned, have 100% magic damage resistance, and take bonus physical damage. If the petrified unit is an illusion, it is immediately killed.

skills.name: Berserker's Rage
skills.description: While active, Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have a chance to bash, dealing bonus damage and stunning the target. Berserker's Rage also grants additional movement speed, armor, and increased attack speed.

skills.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
skills.description: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 900 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.

skills.name: Fervor
skills.description: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

skills.name: Battle Trance
skills.description: Troll's presence on the battlefield increases the attack speed of himself and all allied heroes.

skills.name: Hoof Stomp
skills.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.

skills.name: Double Edge
skills.description: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target.  Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.

skills.name: Return
skills.description: Centaur applies an aura to nearby allied units. Causes allies to counter every attack, damaging the attacker based on a percentage of Centaur's strength.

skills.name: Stampede
skills.description: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and stop any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.

skills.name: Shockwave
skills.description: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.

skills.name: Empower
skills.description: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.

skills.name: Skewer
skills.description: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk.  Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and slowed.

skills.name: Reverse Polarity
skills.description: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.

skills.name: Whirling Death
skills.description: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal Pure damage if a tree is cut down in the process.

skills.name: Timber Chain
skills.description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.

skills.name: Reactive Armor
skills.description: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor.

skills.name: Chakram
skills.description: Fires your main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it. Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted. While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.

skills.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
skills.description: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.

skills.name: Quill Spray
skills.description: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback. Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.

skills.name: Bristleback
skills.description: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear. If Bristleback takes 210 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

skills.name: Warpath
skills.description: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.

skills.name: Ice Shards
